title: BAP candidate Muhammad Saleh Bhootani wins PB-21
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Balochistan Awami Party (BAP) candidate Muhammad Saleh Bhootani won the Balochistan Assembly election from PB-21, Hub by securing 30,910 votes.
According to the unofficial result of the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was National Party candidate Rajab Ali Rind who bagged 17,000 votes.
Votersâ€™ turn-out remained at 55.15 per cent.
